programme.title: Exit Speed
programme.desc: Ten strangers aboard a bus are forced off the road by a nomadic biker gang. Taking refuge in an abandoned scrap yard, they use improvised weapons, adrenaline and sheer guts to mount a defense against the murderous bikers. As their numbers dwindle, they realize that their survival depends on doing the unthinkable - fighting for their lives!

programme.title: Contract Killers
programme.desc: Double-crossed by those he trusted the most, a newbie government hit man discovers that he's the target for the world's most dangerous assassin and so begins a ruthless game of kill first or be killed.

programme.title: Sky High Scrapers
programme.desc: Explore the work of the two men behind a Phoenix-based window washing business, an enterprise that serves some of the highest skyscrapers in Las Vegas. In the first episode, monsoon winds threaten to disrupt their plans, and the duo explain how blistering sun and violent storms make their jobs increasingly dangerous.

programme.title: Sky High Scrapers
programme.desc: The Abseilon USA crew is put to the test when the aviation light at the very top of the Paris Hotel's Eiffel Tower in Las Vegas needs to be inspected and replaced.

programme.title: Sky High Scrapers
programme.desc: In Phoenix, Mike and Martin find themselves faced with cleaning a giant mirror towering almost to the ceiling of the convention centre, but the task might prove to be too difficult.

programme.title: 7 Below
programme.desc: A group of strangers are trapped in a time warp house where a terrible event transpired exactly 100 years prior.

programme.title: Cloned: The Recreator Chronicles
programme.desc: Duplicates. Doubles. Recreations. They are exact copies of Craig, Tracy and Derek, three friends on a camping trip who accidentally trigger a deadly experiment left by the Recreator, a mysterious scientist with a passion for cloning. Threatened by a superior enemy who knows everything about them, will the teenagers out-smart and escape their dangerous duplicates before they are replaced?

programme.title: Over the Horizon
programme.desc: Having conquered mountains and rivers in his homeland of New Zealand, his sights are now set on exploring the remote islands of the Pacific you can only get to by boat.

programme.title: Over the Horizon
programme.desc: Ellis befriends a local named Lofi, and the two set sail for the isolated island of Tofua. Along the way they explore a newly formed volcanic island, navigate treacherous coral reefs, and must hunt for their dinner.

programme.title: Over the Horizon
programme.desc: Explorer Ellis Emmett sets sail for the islands of Fiji, where he comes face to face with bull sharks, partakes in ancient Fijian fire walking rituals, and anchors in the remote Lau Islands, a beautiful place with a violent past.

programme.title: Searching for a King
programme.desc: Jeremy and Barry explore the cave where David hid from Saul while running for his life. They then visit the arid wilderness of Ein Gedi and see why David picked such a remote location to hide. Finally they venture deep into the West Bank to the city of Hebron, Davidâ€™s first capital.

programme.title: Ace Of Hearts
programme.desc: Officer Daniel Harding is a distinguished member of the K-9 police unit. His partner and best friend is Ace, a police dog.

programme.title: Diamond Dog Caper
programme.desc: A courageous boy battles a gang of bumbling thieves to rescue a dog carrying a fortune in stolen diamonds.

programme.title: Flying By
programme.desc: This musically driven drama follows a successful Real Estate developer who puts his marriage and business on the line when given the opportunity to follow his ultimate, life-long dream... music.

programme.title: Ghost Image
programme.desc: When a young video editor loses her boyfriend in a car crash, she finds solace in watching video footage of him taken the night before he died. When he starts to communicate with her through that video, she wonders if he has broken through the barrier between this world and the next, or if she has slipped off into madness.

programme.title: Pandemic
programme.desc: A virus has stricken New Mexico and a local veterinarian gets caught in the middle. When the military quarantines the area and cuts off all communication, she must pair up with an eccentric rancher who has ideas of his own of what the government is up to, so they can expose the threat and save humanity.

programme.title: The Gardener
programme.desc: Detective Kelly discovers her partner's disappearance is the latest in a string of previously unconnected cases, and who's the prize-winning gardener whose success might be less due to green fingers than to his unique fertilizer recipe?

programme.title: Adulting
programme.desc: No money, no plan, just problems. Adulting explores this hilarious and terrifying part of our lives through an unlikely duo, Katie and Charlie. Katie is a relentlessly chipper actress (waitress) and Charlieâ€™s the hardened realist who just wants you to give up and start drinking. From finding apartments, to sharing a mattress, the girls learn life lessons the hard way.

programme.title: 7 Below
programme.desc: A group of strangers are trapped in a time warp house where a terrible event transpired exactly 100 years prior.
